Title: Wrexham player asked Ryan Reynolds to book his hire car
Description: The Hollywood actor says his offer to help players when they need anything was taken literally.

Title: More offenders could be tagged, as minister insists he's 'not soft on crime'
Description: The prisons minister tells the BBC more criminals could be tagged in future, rather than sent to prison.

Title: Cuktech 15 Ultra is a brand-new 20000mAh power bank with huge potential
Description: Cuktech is a new Chinese brand making power banks and GaN chargers, and with the 15 Ultra, it delivers one of the best 20000mAh power banks you can buy today.

Title: Baseus made the thinnest magnetic power bank, and it's unbelievably good
Description:
Baseus has a new PicoGo series of power banks, with the 5,000mAh model having the distinction of being the thinnest and lightest power bank available today.
The best part? It charges magnetically.

Title: One WWII veteran shares his story on the 80th anniversary of VE Day
Description:
Army veteran Harry Miller was stationed in Germany when the Nazis surrendered.
Upon hearing the news, he recalls that American troops went to sleep or shook hands.
"And some just couldn't believe it."

Title: The Fed keeps interest rates steady. And, U.S. plans to deport migrants to Libya
Description:
The Federal Reserve held interest rates steady amid uncertainty over President Trump's trade war.
And, the Trump administration has plans to deport migrants without legal status to Libya.

Title: AI engines are starting to challenge Google's search dominance
Description: AI tools like ChatGPT and Perplexity AI are coming for traditional search engines.

Title: I spent 8 hours in the cold to see Warren Buffett speak. I witnessed his retirement bombshell — and met Tim Cook and Hillary Clinton.
Description:
John Di Bella III waited in line overnight to attend Warren Buffett's Q&A.
He saw history unfold and snagged photos with Tim Cook and Hillary Clinton.

Title: Living on $270 monthly: How a millennial trans woman crowdfunds to pay her bills
Description: Surviving off of $270 a month, a trans woman fundraises for her medical and basic necessities in a state that has banned gender affirming care.

Title: Breaking down accessibility barriers: how the industry is redefining how we play
Description: Don't miss the ESA is hosting the Accessibility in Gaming Lunch at GamesBeat Summit 2025 in Los Angeles, on Tuesday, May 20.

Title: Yes, Shelves Will Be Empty
Description: Forget Christmas—remember how many medical supplies come from China?

Title: India says it intercepted 'drones and missiles' fired by Pakistan
Description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi had convened on Thursday a meeting of his secretaries to discuss “national preparedness."

Title: The Tyranny of School Spirit Days
Description: How times a year must a child wear a costume to class?

Title: The iPhone gone in 10 years? The case for and against
Description:
Apple SVP Eddy Cue yesterday suggested that we might not need an iPhone ten years from now.
It echoes a report back in 2019, where the company’s execs were cited saying the same thing – also with a decade-ish time-frame.
Apple is absolutely right to take t…

Title: The EPA Plans to Terminate the Energy Star Program. Here’s What That Means
Description: Hit by restructuring, the EPA is reportedly planning to end the Energy Star program, a project that has saved hundreds of billions of dollars for businesses and consumers

Title: Political Attacks on Libraries Endanger Small-Town Democracy
Description: Defending our public libraries is part of a larger struggle for the integrity of institutions essential to democracy, writes one rural sociologist

Title: How Nostalgia Keeps Friendships Alive
Description: The social and psychological consequences of yearning for the past are starting to come into focus

Title: NASA JPL boss bails for 'personal reasons' as budget cuts bite
Description: Laurie Leshin to leave in June Laurie Leshin, director of NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL), is stepping down in June and will be replaced by JPL veteran David Gallagher.…
